title: PLEASE HELP URGENT!
body:
Apparently I cannot purchase anything in the store due to a low amount of ip, the thing is I have **1200 ip** and it says I have only
** 351 ip **to spend. I restarted my client and my computer and still the same error. Please help I need to update my rune page :P

Does anyone else seem to have the problem or is it just me?

replies.body: Other people are also experiencing the same thing. I've started a thread on the same issue here : http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/FKoAQK2M-not-enough-ip-bug
